attributes.additional_details:
Many people have died, been hurt over minor issues. The UK Government needs to intervene to encourage peace and prosperity between Israel and Gaza. Innocent young people have been forced to flee, mothers with several young have been forced into poverty, starvation and hatred towards the opposition.

If both parties continue fighting, they will destroy that which they are fighting over and their own home land!

Both religions of the land, Islam and Judaism promote peace and condemn violence and the killing of many innocents.

This MUST end!  THE UK GOVERNMENT MUST ACT NOW!
